actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend sections 3303a and 1503 of title 44, United States Code, to require mandatory application of the General Records Schedules to all Federal agencies and to resolve conflicts between authorizations for disposal and to provide for the disposal of Federal Register documents.

summary.text: Requires mandatory application of the General Records Schedules to all Federal agencies and provides for the disposal of Federal Register documents.

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 3303a and 1503 of title 44, United States Code, to require mandatory application of the General Records Schedules to all Federal agencies and to resolve conflicts between authorizations for disposal and to provide for the disposal of Federal Register documents.
